name: Tartle's Woods of Gamedev
description:
To be played at night, with sound and with headphones.

controls: w, s, a, d, arrow keys,  space bar

Made August 2017 for #LowRezJam. The jam required the game to fit into a 64 by 64 unit square. This is not a true game. Don't be sad if you can't jump on something's head.
